value.string:
# Look at all items availables for the source and then
 # display them on a listbox so that the user will be able
 # to select them
 from DateTime import DateTime
 request = context.REQUEST
 item_portal_type_list = ["Checkbook","Check"]
 node = context.getBaobabSource()
 #item_portal_type_list = request.get('item_portal_type_list', ["Checkbook","Check"])
 #node = request.get('node', request.get('vault', context.getBaobabSource()))
 destination_payment = request.get('destination_payment', None)
 reference_date = DateTime()
 item_list = []
 listbox = []
 invalid_check_state_list = ('draft', 'confirmed')
 
 getCurrentTrackingList = context.portal_simulation.getCurrentTrackingList
 current_tracking_list = [x.getObject() for x in getCurrentTrackingList(
 at_date=reference_date, node=node,
 where_expression="item_catalog.portal_type='Check' or item_catalog.portal_type='Checkbook'")]
 
 context_portal_type = context.getPortalType()
 simulation_state = None
 model_filter_dict = {}
 disable_node = 0
 if context_portal_type == 'Traveler Check Purchase':
 model_filter_dict['fixed_price']=1
 item_portal_type_list = ('Check',)
 destination_payment = context.getDestinationPayment()
 disable_node = 1
 elif context_portal_type == 'Traveler Check Sale':
 model_filter_dict['fixed_price']=1
 item_portal_type_list = ('Check',)
 elif context_portal_type == 'Checkbook Movement':
 # Nothing special here
 pass
 elif context_portal_type == 'Checkbook Usual Cash Transfer':
 model_filter_dict['fixed_price']=1
 item_portal_type_list = ('Check',)
 
 
 
 context.log('current_tracking_list',current_tracking_list)
 context.log('context_portal_type',context_portal_type)
 context.log('item_portal_type_list',item_portal_type_list)
 for item in current_tracking_list:
 exclude=0
 if model_filter_dict is not None:
 resource = item.getResourceValue()
 for property,value in model_filter_dict.items():
 if resource.getProperty(property)!=value:
 exclude=1
 if destination_payment is not None:
 if destination_payment!=item.getDestinationPayment():
 exclude=1
 context.log('exclude',exclude)
 if not exclude:
 item_portal_type = item.getPortalType()
 context.log('item_portal_type',item_portal_type)
 if item_portal_type in item_portal_type_list:
 if item_portal_type=='Check' and item.getSimulationState() not in ('draft','confirmed'):
 continue
 context.log('simulation_state',simulation_state)
 if simulation_state is not None:
 context.log('item',item.getRelativeUrl())
 context.log('item.getSimulationState',item.getSimulationState())
 context.log('item.getReferenceRangeMin',item.getReference())
 if item.getSimulationState()!=simulation_state:
 continue
 item_dict = {}
 if item_portal_type=='Check':
 item_dict['reference_range_max'] = item.getReference()
 item_dict['reference_range_min'] = item.getReference()
 else:
 item_dict['reference_range_min'] = item.getReferenceRangeMin()
 item_dict['reference_range_max'] = item.getReferenceRangeMax()
 item_dict['resource_title'] = item.getResourceTitle()
 item_dict['destination_trade'] = item.getDestinationTradeTitle()
 item_dict['check_amount_title'] = item.getCheckAmountTitle()
 item_dict['selection'] = 0
 item_dict['uid'] = 'new_%s' %(item.getUid(),)
 
 listbox.append(item_dict)
 
 
 context.Base_updateDialogForm(listbox=listbox)
 return context.ListBox_initializeFastInput()
